subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are 13-3 and have scored 6.9 runs a game without Jason Giambi, who must decide by Thursday if he plans to cooperate with baseball’s investigation into steroid use.
snippet: The Yankees are 13-3 and have scored 6.9 runs a game without Jason Giambi, who must decide by Thursday if he plans to cooperate with baseball’s investigation into steroid use.
